title: grid-row
description: The `grid-row` CSS property is a shorthand for setting the `grid-row-start` and `grid-row-end` properties.
content: The shorthand property that specifies the starting and ending points of a grid item across the rows in a grid layout. It combines `grid-row-start` and `grid-row-end` properties into one declaration, offering control over how many rows an item covers.
